alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:18PM EDT until July 22 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR LACKAWANNA...WEST CENTRAL WAYNE AND NORTHEASTERN WYOMING COUNTIES... At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wallsville, or near Waverly, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Dunmore, Carbondale, Archbald, Blakely, Taylor, Dickson City, Olyphant, Clarks Summit and Jessup. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
